page.title: 07MUSHROOM FARM HIGH RODING
page.content: { {MUSHROOM FARM. Every Tuesday 20 ton of compost is delivered and used to fill 256 growing boxes 4' x 3'. This is then pasteurised to l40 F., and then allowed to cool, so that on the following Monday the spawn can be added to the compost. This is then covered with a layer of casing material, chalk and lime. The boxes are now taken to the growing house where they are carefully monitored for the correct humidity, temperature, and water content. After 4 weeks the first flush of mushrooms appear and are picked by hand. There are 5 or 6 subsequent flushes each lasting a week. The beds are then exhausted. The cycle then re starts.Yield 6 to 7 thousand lbs weight mushrooms per week.
